channel.title: GUI Theme on Web Client and Web Client on Mac?
channel.description:
So I have my web client at http://jellyscape.co.uk/client.html It works fine on my PC but how do I get the client to display the GUI theme like Mopar's? Also, my online client doesn't work on my Mac - I assume because the cache directory is the C Drive but is there some universal code I can use instead?
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 04:07:20 pm[/size][hr]cmon it cant be tht hard...?

item.title: GUI Theme on Web Client and Web Client on Mac?

@Jellybean732 wrote:

So I have my web client at http://jellyscape.co.uk/client.html
It works fine on my PC but how do I get the client to display the GUI theme like Mopar’s?
Also, my online client doesn’t work on my Mac - I assume because the cache directory is the C Drive but is there some universal code I can use instead?
